alert.note: Alert for Hooker; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 12:14PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Hooker, north central Lincoln, Logan, eastern McPherson, southwestern Blaine and southern Thomas Counties through 100 PM CDT/NOON MDT/... At 1214 PM CDT/1114 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles southwest of Thedford to 13 miles northeast of Tryon to near Ringgold. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stapleton, Tryon, Halsey, Gandy, Ringgold, Logan, Highway 83 crossing The Dismal River, Shanklin Bluff, Tarboz Lake, Hoagland and Brown Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 201 and 240. Highway 97 between mile markers 15 and 39. Highway 83 between mile markers 97 and 143. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
